mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNABOARD ORDER BY QNANO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into qnaboard( qnano, title, writer, content, qnaregdate, qnacnt ) values( freeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate, #{qnacnt} )
mapper.update: update qnaboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where qnano = #{qnano}
